query.statement:
SELECT '' AS CHECK ,MS002.MANDT AS MANDT -- 클라이언트 ,MS002.POSID_1 AS POSID_1 -- 호기번호 ,VALUE(CS101.CS101_HNA,'') AS HNA -- 호기명 ,CASE WHEN CS111.MANDT IS NOT NULL THEN SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS111.MANDT,'CS138',CS111.HST) ELSE '' END AS HST -- 호기상태 ,VALUE(CS101.CS101_WDT,'') AS WDT -- 완성검사일 ,CASE WHEN CS101.MANDT IS NOT NULL THEN SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS101.MANDT,'PS004',CS101.CS101_WNO) ELSE '' END AS WNO -- 완성검사기관 ,VALUE(CS101.CS101_SCT,'') AS SCT -- 중간검사일 ,VALUE(CS101.CS101_RCD,'') AS RCD -- QE검사일 ,VALUE(CS101.CS101_IGD,'') AS IGD -- 보수인계일 ,VALUE(CS101.CS101_FDT,'') AS FDT -- 보수인수일 ,VALUE(CS101.CS101_IJY,'') AS IJY -- 입주예정일 ,CASE WHEN MS002.ZOIPSU='00000000' THEN '' ELSE MS002.ZOIPSU END AS ZOIPSU -- 입주일 ,VALUE(CS101.CS101_ARA,'') AS ARA -- 대지역 코드 ,CASE WHEN CS101.MANDT IS NOT NULL THEN SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS101.MANDT,'CS115',CS101.CS101_ARA) ELSE '' END AS ARA_NM -- 대지역명 ,VALUE(CS101.CS101_BPM,'') AS BPM -- 보수PM ,CASE WHEN CS101.MANDT IS NOT NULL THEN SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(CS101.MANDT,CS101.CS101_BPM) ELSE '' END AS BPM_NM -- 보수PM 성명 ,VALUE(CS101.CS101_BSU,'') AS BSU -- 협력사 코드 ,CASE WHEN CS101.MANDT IS NOT NULL THEN SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(CS101.MANDT,CS101.CS101_BSU) ELSE '' END AS NAME1 -- 협력사명 ,(SELECT MAX(LIFNR) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT005 WHERE MANDT=MS002.MANDT AND LGORT=CS101.CS101_BSU) LIFNR ,(SELECT TELF1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M WHERE M.MANDT = MS002.MANDT AND M.LIFNR = (SELECT MAX(LIFNR) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT005 WHERE MANDT=MS002.MANDT AND LGORT=CS101.CS101_BSU)) TELF1 ,(SELECT TELFX FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M WHERE M.MANDT = MS002.MANDT AND M.LIFNR = (SELECT MAX(LIFNR) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT005 WHERE MANDT=MS002.MANDT AND LGORT=CS101.CS101_BSU)) TELFX ,CASE WHEN CS111.MANDT IS NOT NULL THEN SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(CS111.MANDT,CS111.JUJ) ELSE '' END AS JUJ -- 주점검자 ,CASE WHEN CS111.MANDT IS NOT NULL THEN SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(CS111.MANDT,CS111.BUJ) ELSE '' END AS BUJ -- 부점검자 ,(SELECT USERMBPN FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = JUJ) JUJ_HP ,(SELECT USERMBPN FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = BUJ) BUJ_HP ,(SELECT USERMBPN FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = BPM) BPM_HP ,VALUE(CS111.UPN || CS111.CST,'') AS UPN -- 통합프로젝트 ,CASE WHEN CS111.MANDT IS NOT NULL THEN VALUE((
SELECT TRIM(CS121_NAM) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST121 AS CS121 WHERE CS121.MANDT = CS111.MANDT AND CS121.CS121_UPN = CS111.UPN AND CS121.CS121_CST = CS111.CST
),'') ELSE '' END AS UPN_NM -- 고객명 ,VALUE(CS111.ABG,'') AS ABG -- 건물구분 코드 ,CASE WHEN CS111.MANDT IS NOT NULL THEN SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS111.MANDT,'CS112',CS111.ABG) ELSE '' END AS ABG_NM -- 건물구분 ,VALUE(CS111.AGB,'') AS AGB -- 시내/시외 코드 ,CASE WHEN CS111.MANDT IS NOT NULL THEN SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS111.MANDT,'CS116',CS111.AGB) ELSE '' END AS AGB_NM -- 시내/시외 ,MS002.ZMUSAOCNT AS ZMUSAOCNT -- 무상공사 계약개월수 ,VALUE((SELECT MIN(CS116_BGT) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PJT = CS111.PJT AND CS116_HNO = CS111.HNO AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'A'),'') AS MPS -- 시작일 ,VALUE((SELECT MAX(CS116_BMT) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PJT = CS111.PJT AND CS116_HNO = CS111.HNO AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'A'),'') AS MPT -- 만료일 ,MS002.ZMUSAOCNT2 AS ZMUSAOCNT2 -- 무상일반 계약개월수 ,VALUE((SELECT MIN(CS116_BGT) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PJT = CS111.PJT AND CS116_HNO = CS111.HNO AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'B'),'') AS MYS -- 시작일 ,VALUE((SELECT MAX(CS116_BMT) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PJT = CS111.PJT AND CS116_HNO = CS111.HNO AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'B'),'') AS MYT -- 만료일 ,VALUE((SELECT MIN(CS126_USD) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_PJT = CS111.PJT AND CS126_HNO = CS111.HNO AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_GND = 'C'),'') AS SST -- 유상공사 시작일 ,VALUE((SELECT MAX(CS126_UMR) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_PJT = CS111.PJT AND CS126_HNO = CS111.HNO AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_GND = 'C'),'') AS SMT -- 만료일 ,VALUE((SELECT MIN(CS126_USD) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_PJT = CS111.PJT AND CS126_HNO = CS111.HNO AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_GND = 'D'),'') AS USJ -- 유상일반 시작일 ,VALUE((SELECT MAX(CS126_UMR) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_PJT = CS111.PJT AND CS126_HNO = CS111.HNO AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_GND = 'D'),'') AS UMD -- 만료일 ,CASE WHEN CS111.MANDT IS NOT NULL THEN SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS111.MANDT,'CS124',CS111.JGD) ELSE '' END AS JGD -- 일시중지(유상)-중지(보류)구분 ,VALUE(CS111.JJD,'') AS JJD -- 일시중지(유상)-중지(보류)일자 ,VALUE(CS111.UDT,'') AS UDT -- 일시중지(유상)-복구일자 ,VALUE(CS111.FSD,'') AS FSD -- 실패(승인)일자 ,VALUE(CS111.MNO,'') AS MNO -- 공사번호(구) ,VALUE(PS18.CHK, '') AS CHK ,VALUE(PS18.MDATE, '') AS MDATE ,'' AS GBN
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS MS002 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 AS CS101 ON CS101.MANDT = MS002.MANDT AND CS101.CS101_PJT = MS002.POSID AND CS101.CS101_HNO = SUBSTR(MS002.POSID_1,7,3) LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 AS CS111 ON CS111.MANDT = MS002.MANDT AND CS111.PJT = MS002.POSID AND CS111.HNO = SUBSTR(MS002.POSID_1,7,3)
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW1802 AS PS18 ON PS18.MANDT = MS002.MANDT AND PS18.PSPID = MS002.POSID AND PS18.POSID = MS002.POSID_1 AND PS18.GBN = #GBN# WHERE MS002.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MS002.POSID = #PSPID# AND MS002.ZZGUBUN < '90'
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
